mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_STATUS_INF ( BANKCODE, CHKTYPE, ACTDATE, BANKFILSTS, BKGFILSTS, CHKPROSTS ) VALUES ( #{bankcode}, #{chktype}, #{actdate}, #{bankfilsts}, #{bkgfilsts}, #{chkprosts} )

INSERT INTO MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_THD_INF ( BK_CODE, MER_NO, TER_NO, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_SEQ, CARD_NO, PAY_NO, PAY_AMT, INC_AMT, SETTLE_DT, REF_NO, TRAN_TYPE, CK_DT ) VALUES( #{bankcode}, #{merNo}, #{terNo}, #{tranTime}, #{tranSeq}, #{cardNo}, #{payNo}, #{payAmt}, #{incAmt}, #{settleDt}, #{refNo}, #{tranType}, #{actdate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_STATUS_INF
BANKCODE = #{bankcode},
CHKTYPE = #{chktype},
ACTDATE = #{actdate},
BANKFILSTS = #{bankfilsts},
BKGFILSTS = #{bkgfilsts},
CHKPROSTS = #{chkprosts},
BANKTXNNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_BANK_INF WHERE BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
BANKTXNAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_BANK_INF WHERE BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
BANKDOUBTNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '01' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
BANKDOUBTAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '01' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
PAYTXNNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_PAY_INF WHERE BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
PAYTXNAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_PAY_INF WHERE BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
PAYDOUBTNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '02' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
PAYDOUBTAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '02' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
SUCCESSNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_INF WHERE BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
SUCCESSAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_INF WHERE BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
DOUBTBANKNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '01' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
DOUBTBANKAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '01' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
DOUBTPAYNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '02' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
DOUBTPAYAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '02' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
ERRORBANKNUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_ERROR_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '01' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
ERRORBANKAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_ERROR_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '01' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
ERRORPAYANUM = (SELECT count(*) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_ERROR_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '02' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}),
ERRORPAYAMT = (SELECT sum(TXNAMT) FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_ERROR_INF WHERE CHECKDOUBTTYPE = '02' AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode} AND ACTDATE = #{actdate})
AND BANKCODE = #{bankcode}
AND ACTDATE = #{actdate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_INF( BK_CODE, MER_NO, TER_NO, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_SEQ, CARD_NO, PAY_NO, PAY_AMT, INC_AMT, SETTLE_DT, REF_NO, TRAN_TYPE, CK_DT ) SELECT MP.BK_CODE, MP.MER_NO, MP.TER_NO, MP.TRAN_TIME, MP.TRAN_SEQ, MP.CARD_NO, MP.LOC_PAY_NO, MP.PAY_AMT, MP.INC_AMT, MP.SETTLE_DT, MP.REF_NO, MP.TRAN_TYPE, MP.CK_DT FROM MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_PAY_INF MP, MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_THD_INF BK WHERE trim(MP.TRAN_SEQ)=trim(BK.TRAN_SEQ) AND trim(MP.PAY_AMT)=trim(BK.PAY_AMT)
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_PAY_INF WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_INF BK
trim(MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_PAY_INF.BANKLOGNO)=trim(BK.BANKLOGNO)
AND trim(MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_PAY_INF.TXNAMT)=trim(BK.TXNAMT)
AND trim(MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_PAY_INF.TXNAMT) !=trim(BK.TXNAMT)
)

DELETE FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_BANK_INF WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_INF MP
trim(MP.BANKLOGNO)=trim(MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_BANK_INF.BANKLOGNO)
AND trim(MP.TXNAMT)=trim(MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_BANK_INF.TXNAMT)
AND trim(MP.TXNAMT) !=trim(MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_BANK_INF.TXNAMT)
)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_ERROR_INF ( BK_CODE, MER_NO, TER_NO, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_SEQ, CARD_NO, PAY_NO, PAY_AMT, INC_AMT, SETTLE_DT, REF_NO, TRAN_TYPE, CK_DT, LOC_PAY_NO ) SELECT MP.BK_CODE, MP.MER_NO, MP.TER_NO, MP.TRAN_TIME, MP.TRAN_SEQ, MP.CARD_NO, MP.PAY_NO, MP.PAY_AMT, MP.INC_AMT, MP.SETTLE_DT, MP.REF_NO, MP.TRAN_TYPE, MP.CK_DT, MP.LOC_PAY_NO FROM MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_PAY_INF MP, MPBATCH_VERIFIACCOUNT_THD_INF BK WHERE trim(MP.TRAN_SEQ)=trim(BK.TRAN_SEQ) AND trim(MP.PAY_AMT) !=trim(BK.PAY_AMT)
mapper.update:
UPDATE MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF
BANKCODE = #{bankcode},
ACTDATE = #{actdate},
BANKLOGNO = #{banklogno},
CHKTYPE = #{chktype},
BANKDATE = #{bankdate},
CCYCOD = #{ccycod},
TXNAMT = #{txnamt},
FEE = #{fee},
INAMT = #{inamt},
CUST_ID = #{custId},
PAYNO = #{payno},
CHECKDATE = #{checkdate},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime},
CHECKTYPE = #{checktype},
CHECKNUM = #{checknum},
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPBATCH_CHECKACCOUNT_DOUBT_INF ( BANKCODE, ACTDATE, BANKLOGNO, CHKTYPE, BANKDATE, CCYCOD, TXNAMT, FEE, INAMT, CUST_ID, PAYNO, CHECKDATE, CHECKTIME, CHECKTYPE, CHECKNUM, ) VALUES ( #{bankcode}, #{actdate}, #{banklogno}, #{chktype}, #{bankdate}, #{ccycod}, #{txnamt}, #{fee}, #{inamt}, #{custId}, #{payno}, #{checkdate}, #{checktime}, #{checktype}, #{checknum}, )
